name: Temporal Positions (fMRI Volumes)
description: Validates that an fMRI acquisition has at least 100 temporal positions (volumes).
implementation:
# Validate temporal positions (fMRI volumes)
n_volumes = value["NumberOfTemporalPositions"].iloc[0]

if n_volumes < 100:
    raise ValidationError(f"Expected at least 100 temporal positions for fMRI, found {n_volumes}.")

testCases.name: Insufficient volumes
testCases.description: Should fail with fewer than 100 volumes
